definition.text: This topic covers the logistics and details of how to contribute different kinds of assets to the project, including a Trading System, a Data Mine, icons, documentation, translations, tutorials, and so on.

paragraphs.text: Scan the table of contents below to find the documentation about how to contribute the kind of asset you may have in mind.
If there is no explanation about the type of asset you wish to contribute, please reach out to the team in the Superalgos Community Group!
